response.overview: THIS AWARD-WINNING, BIG-BUDGET REBOOT OF THE CLASSIC 1960s GAMERA FRANCHISE, BRINGS THE GIANT TURTLE MONSTER BACK TO LIFE IN A GORGEOUS HIGH-DEFINITION DOUBLE FEATURE PRESENTATION!  Gamera, the Guardian of the Universe - An ornithologist investigates reports of a monstrous new species of bird just as a teenage girl is gifted an amulet found on mysterious atoll. As the creatures begin to attack, an ancient guardian with a bond to the girl emerges.  Gamera 2: Attack of the Legion - A meteor lands in Japan and unleashes hundreds of insect-like "Legion" creatures bent on colonizing the Earth. Gamera shows up to deal with the ever-evolving space adversary, but the battle may result in him losing his bond with humanity.
response.title: Gamera Double Feature
